data.name: 迷·局-新京医院
data.detailed_description:
This is a decryption game set in a campus and hospital. Players will take on the roles of their respective choices and enter into a foggy scripted killing, unlocking the organs and collecting and analyzing clues to unravel the truth behind the serial case thirty years ago step by step.

The game contains two lines, more than ten levels, multiple endings, a large number of brain-burning puzzles waiting for you to solve!
The game supports 1-4 players to play online, and the built-in voice helps you communicate with your partner smoothly!

If you encounter any problems during the game, welcome to join the official QQ group 612065641, there will be professional customer service staff to help you solve.

data.short_description: this is a decryption game set in a campus and hospital. Players will take on the roles of their respective choices and enter into a foggy scripted killing, unlocking the organs and collecting and analyzing clues to unravel the truth behind a serial case thirty years ago, step by step.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 2GB or Radeon HD 7770 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: null
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: null

developers: JILIN JAI PANGU NETWORK SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY CO.,LTD
publishers: JILIN JAI PANGU NETWORK SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY CO.,LTD
